name: Humble Abode
description: In this atmospheric adventure your own home becomes the playground of a sadistic intruder. Can you find a way to avoid being a prisoner in your house, or will you even live long enough to try?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space
